title: FindLaw Directory Scraper
description: Extract lawyer and law firm data from FindLaw.com directory listings. Provide either practice area/state/county OR a direct FindLaw directory URL.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Direct FindLaw directory URL to scrape (e.g., https://lawyers.findlaw.com/bankruptcy-law/california/alameda-county/). If provided, this overrides practiceArea/state/county fields.

practiceArea.title: Practice Area
practiceArea.description: Legal practice area slug (e.g., 'bankruptcy-law', 'personal-injury-plaintiff', 'criminal-defense'). Used only if startUrl is not provided.

state.title: State
state.description: U.S. state slug (e.g., 'california', 'new-york', 'texas'). Used only if startUrl is not provided.

county.title: County (optional)
county.description: County slug for more specific searches (e.g., 'alameda-county', 'los-angeles'). Leave empty for state-wide search.

city.title: City (optional)
city.description: City slug for highly specific searches (e.g., 'san-francisco', 'new-york'). Leave empty for broader search.

results_wanted.title: Maximum Results
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of lawyer/firm listings to extract. Leave empty to collect all available listings.

max_pages.title: Maximum Pages
max_pages.description: Safety limit on the number of directory pages to visit. Prevents excessive crawling.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings for the scraper. Residential proxies recommended for best results.
